Title: Login page loads successfully
Expected_Result: Login page loads with Branch, Username, Password fields

Title: Valid login navigates to Dashboard
Steps: Enter Branch, Username, Password > Click Login

Title: Branch is mandatory validation
Expected_Result: System shows 'Please fill out this field.'

Title: Username is mandatory validation
Expected_Result: System shows 'Please fill out this field.'

Title: Password is mandatory validation
Expected_Result: System shows 'Please fill out this field.'

Title: Invalid Branch shows correct message
Steps: Enter invalid Branch + valid Username/Password > Login

Title: Invalid credentials shows correct message
Steps: Enter valid Branch + invalid Username or Password > Login
Expected_Result: System shows 'Invalid user name or password'

Title: RBAC: Branch Admin can access Users module
RBAC: Loan Manager cannot add new users
Steps: Open Users page > verify Add User option
Expected_Result: Add User is not available / action blocked

Title: RBAC: Loan Officer cannot view Events
Steps: Check navigation for Events / try direct access if possible
Expected_Result: Events not visible or access denied

Title: Logout ends session and returns to login
Expected_Result: Session ends; user returned to login; protected pages require login
